session_summary: John and James caught up at 1:45 pm on 6 August, 2022. John shared that he left his IT job of 3 years to pursue a more fulfilling career that aligns with his values. He expressed happiness with the decision. James praised John's bravery in making the change. John revealed his plan to organize gaming tournaments, starting with CS:GO and Fortnite. James supported John's new career endeavor and offered financial assistance if needed. James shared that his puppy had a routine medical check-up and vaccination. John admired James for his care towards his pets. The conversation ended with mutual goodbyes and well-wishes.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Hey James, good catching up! Been a while huh? I made a huge call - recently left my IT job after 3 years. It was tough but I wanted something that made a difference. And now with this new job, I am happy about my decision. I am loving the new job!

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Hey John! Great to hear from you. Leaving after 3 years is a big step - how did it feel?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: At first, it was super scary, but I knew I had to make a change and focus on things that align with my values and passions.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Wow, John, that sounds really brave. I hope it brings you joy and satisfaction.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, James. It wasn't easy, but sometimes you gotta take a leap to follow your heart.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Taking risks pays off! Way to be brave. I'm proud of you!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Your support means a lot. Lately, I've been thinking about what truly makes me happy, and I'm really drawn to the gaming industry. I'm passionate about it and it's time to turn that into a career. I want to become an organizer of tournaments for various computer games in our state. For example, for CS:GO. It's a new journey for me.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Cool! You always mentioned your love for gaming. What other game do you want to organize competitions for? And what`s your plan now?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Also, I can host Fortnite competitions. I have already made some connections that will help me with this. My plan is to gain more experience and perfect my skills to be successful in this field.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Sounds like a solid plan! Trying out different game genres can be a great way to widen your skills and knowledge.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! I am very glad that you support me in my new endeavor!

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: I will always be here for you! If you need any financial assistance or advice, please contact me!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a desk with a computer monitor and keyboard
conversation_turns.text: I will definitely do this if necessary! By the way, what's new with you?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Yesterday I took my puppy to the clinic.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: God, James, what happened to your puppy? Is it OK?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Don't worry. This was just a routine examination. Also, the puppy was vaccinated to prevent him from catching the seasonal canine disease.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Phew, great that he's okay. It's great that you care so much about your pets!

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: They are the source of my joy, so I will always take care of them!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: You're a great host, James! Well, I have to go, bye!

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, John! Take care, bye!

James: James takes the puppy to the vet for its necessary vaccinations to prevent him from catching the seasonal canine disease.
John: John reflects on quitting his IT job that he worked at for three years, and joining a new job that he likes.
John wants to pursue a career in organizing gaming tournaments in his state.
John recently left his IT job after 3 years because he wanted something that made a difference.
John is passionate about the gaming industry and wants to become an organizer for gaming tournaments, starting with CS:GO and Fortnite.
John values support and is grateful for the support he receives from James in his new career endeavor.
James: James recently took his puppy for a routine examination and vaccination to prevent seasonal canine disease.
James deeply cares for his pets and ensures their well-being.
